template.p: Welcome to the Odoo Team Sport Clubs package!
This guide helps you manage your club end-to-end‚Äîfrom sponsorships and events to player management, fan engagement, and bookings.
Your Odoo Team Sport Clubs package includes all the essential apps to centralize and simplify your club operations:

li.p: Teams App: Organize your club's structure by managing rosters, assigning players to specific squads, and tracking team compositions.
CRM App: Professionalize your funding by tracking potential sponsors and managing sponsorship deals effectively.
Events App: Engage your fanbase by selling match tickets and managing registrations for tournaments or social events online.
Point of Sale App: Run your club's bar or merchandise shop efficiently, handling sales of drinks, snacks, and team jerseys.
Planning App: Optimize your facilities by scheduling field and court bookings to prevent conflicts between teams.
Sales App: Generate professional sponsorship offers and formal contribution requests to secure revenue.
Invoicing App: Keep the club's finances healthy by invoicing members and sponsors and tracking incoming payments.
Project App: Coordinate complex activities like player recruitment drives and trial days with clear tasks and timelines.
Website App: Build a digital home for your club to showcase team profiles, sell merchandise, and manage online enrollments.

template.p: The Teams app empowers you to:

li.p: Create and manage teams for different age groups or levels.
Assign players to teams, track positions, and manage roster changes.

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o-contenteditable-false lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p: For annual contributions, you can easily manage specific prices for each team by setting up pricelists. Once this is set up in the Teams app, you can select all the players to whom you want to send the contribution request. A smart button, Request Contribution, will appear. Click it to select the correct product, assign a tag corresponding to the period, and generate all the Sales Orders.

li.p: Track potential sponsors, categorize and track their interest.
Manage proposal stages: initial outreach ‚Üí negotiation ‚Üí closed deal.
Plan follow-up actions (calls, emails, meetings) to nurture sponsorship relationships.
Process on-site bar and shop purchases during matches or club events.
Handle cash, card, or digital payments.
Sync inventory for on-the-fly restocking and managing stock levels.
Create and manage matches or fundraising event pages.
Sell and validate tickets online or on-site.
Track attendance and issue reminders or notifications.

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o-contenteditable-false lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p: You can also use the Events app to plan recurring trainings and matches with the Slots system.

Select Multi-slot Event and access the slot calendars through the new smart button. This allows you to easily schedule trainings for the entire year and invite your players to register for each session.

template.p: With the Planning app, you can:

li.p: Set up available time slots for field or court usage.
Avoid scheduling conflicts with clear, live availability.

template.p: The Sales app enables you to:

li.p: Build professional sponsorship proposals (e.g., Platinum, Gold, Silver tiers).
Set up recurring offers for annual club contributions or memberships.
Generate quotation templates for swift turnaround.
Convert sponsorship agreements, ticket orders, or shop sales into invoices.
Send invoices immediately and track payments.
Reconcile payments with sponsorship contracts and membership dues.
The Appointments app for scheduling trials, interviews, or training sessions with prospective players.
The Project app to track each recruit‚Äôs progress, documents, communications, and evaluation steps.

template.p: Your Website & eCommerce setup allows you to:

li.p: Showcase club history, mission, teams, coaching staff, and calendar of events.
Sell merchandise (jerseys, accessories) and event tickets online.
Allow fans to enroll or register players for next season or camps.
